_source.text: 10 Reasons Why Online Video Is Better Than TV For Marketers And Advertisers With some may options out there (YouTube, Hulu, Netflix, and now local options such as iZonOrlando) its just downright silly to throw your money away trying to reach an audience that is simply not there anymore.
